bio:
Hi, I’m Nayab Sohail and I am an English language lecturer with over 15 years of experience in teaching. I am an expert in Proofreading, Copy Editing and Content Writing. My skills have allowed me to have diverse work experiences with various publishing and academic organizations.
I would describe myself as a conscious, confident and opportunistic person who has a constant outlook towards experiencing new things in life and growing beyond the demographic and cultural community of mine. Over the years, I have focused on gaining experiences and opportunities that would help me develop the right skill set to work in diverse settings. For instance, I worked as a coach for the English language, which enhanced my communication skills for enhanced outcomes and credibility of my work.
I am hardworking and resilient, therefore making sure that I manage my time to stay ahead of my deadlines. Working as a teacher has helped me manage my workload because of which I make significant contributions to my work. Through my experiences, I upgraded my skills; I pay great attention to detail and strong grammar skills allow me to correct the direction of communication. I also possess excellent computer skills utilizing multiple applications. Therefore, my accuracy rates are extremely high due to which I received a certificate for High Performance Management.
Additionally, I have a degree in English literature and language that backs up my credibility as a worker in the field. I have worked for Bookwise publishers and schools for curriculum designing and planning.
I have started my YouTube channel and I do all the voiceover myself. So, I'm up to English ( non native) and Urdu voiceover.
We can have commitments per hour or per assignment. The best way to communicate with me is WhatsApp.

abstrac: I provide on time and reliable tax preparations, tax planning and bookkeeping, and I will work diligently to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.
bio:
I am an Enrolled Agent and a registered tax preparer for which I possess an active PTIN.

I graduated Summa Cum Laude at Penn State University with a 3.79 GPA, which was the top 6% of my class. My career path led me to Taxation, in which I have been doing tax preparation for several years while working year-round as a tax accountant and tax consultant.

My experience and background in taxation has granted me the ability to prepare federal, state & local tax returns across the country. I have my own tax software, but I am adaptive with any tax software should the need arise to work in another program. Additionally, I am highly advanced with QuickBooks & Excel, and I am equipped to do full-service bookkeeping in addition to tax preparation. I have successfully completed tax preparation and bookkeeping services for businesses and individuals with diverse portfolios, ranging from low to very high net worth individuals.

I provide on time and reliable tax preparations, tax planning and bookkeeping, which provides my clients with a full-service accounting function in one place. I strive to save time and money for my clients while providing them with an experienced professional in their corner with their best interests at heart. If I take you on as a client, I will work diligently to meet your needs and exceed your expectations.

Work hours: 6am to 10pm EST
Payment: $50 an hour, but negotiable depending on job requirements.
Communication: Phone and E-mail (provided upon hire)

abstrac: An experienced UX/UI Designer, Product Designer, Visual Designer
bio:
I’m a creative, UX Designer, Product designer, Design Strategist and Design Trainer.
I love to work with companies to help in designing products and define product experience that solve real problems.
To accomplish this, I strictly follow the UX Design process which starts with User Research, Storyboarding and Design prototyping and Usability Testing to help and  guide the product development Team.
As a creative UX Designer, Expert Design communicator, problem solver, I love helping people to make great products with great User experience.

Product & User research:
I believe without understanding the user and his problems and at the same without understanding the product business scope, we don't see any great product in the market.
User research helps to understand the story of people (users) lives and helps to understand their pains and problems, which helps to define key product opportunities.

Product strategy:
Defining product strategy is key decision making in product design life cycle. Once we understand the people and their problems. Same time we’ve got to know the business scope and priorities will help to  identify the product tasks translated to product features. Based on this will create a design strategy with a complete design road map including design activities, deliverables, timeline and milestones.

Experience Design
Experience design, not the experience just from the system level or user interface level,
But the experience as a whole from the users, By focusing on  end to end experience of a solution will bring great user experience for the product, which will lead customers to happiness and will win business in the market.

I’m experienced in creating sketches, wireframes with rapid design prototyping, interaction design to different types of devices, pixel perfect Visual design based on branding and usability testing.
I’m experienced in creating sketches, wireframes with rapid design prototyping, interaction design to different types of devices, pixel perfect Visual design based on branding and usability testing.

description.title: Technical Writing, Proofreading, Editing
description: Technical writing may include software user manuals, systems programming, systems architecture, design specifications, or C-level briefs on the latest features. Repair manuals for high end devices and…

bio:
I started developing web systems over 25 years ago. I've worked with technical documentation for 30, and have spent quite a bit of time on various analysis efforts during those years. I've worked internationally, developed business, and developed financial models for international trade. One of my services is editing technical materials written by non-native English speakers for publication in English. Another service is assistance with the requirements for publication. 

I've spent 25 years working with relational database systems - SQL, MS Access, MySQL, designing, building, and recovering therm. I've moved older systems to the web and rapidly prototyped models. Having the data needed is the first step in being able to do any analysis. Then, being able to visualize the data can make trends and corrections easier to see and easier for the business to manage.

Once we get started, we will have agreed on the work to be done and I will have given you some idea of what to expect. I normally respond within a few minutes. Sometimes, it may take an hour or two, depending on where you are and what time of day you sent the message. I always respond as soon as I see a message come through. 

For meetings, there are phone and web conferencing options. 

I actively confirm what is wanted and do my best to deliver. Where there are technical issues, I look for them early so they are easier to address. Every issue and every milestone achieved is documented in the project log. That way, it's easy to follow progress and easy to find any agreed changes or issues. 

Payments C2C. Company Tax ID and Professional Insurance.

abstrac: The Right Sight Words At The Right Time “Writing is a journey.”
bio:
“Writing is a journey. There are ups and there are downs. I’m being honest.”
As a writer I believe, the words written upon the page provide a portal into the life of the writer.

“Whether the words are written with pen and pad or typed on a device”.I learn

“Writing is a journey.” 

There are countless reasons why we write, how we started, and why we continue. Each person has his or her own unique narrative behind the reasons to write.

People like me who born to write always search for something meaningful,a longing to create something of value. Within each writer there exists an artist’s heart and the spirit to share that heart with the world. “It is an intimate relationship that is formed between writer and reader.”

I started my career as a freelancer and  I’ve done everything from books, articles, eBooks, blogs,websites, newspaper and magazine work, SEO content, editing, proofreading and more. 

As a digital marketer I learn, when the reader begins scanning the words of the writer,this opens up the door for endless potential in that newly formed relationship.

As a Content provider,I have developed my writing skills with regards to creative, informative,technical, sales-oriented, and academic writing.

After the learning of 7 years I know what it is like to be in the full flow of progressive thought and inspiration when opening the notebook or blank document to begin writing a new exciting piece I want to give to my readers

My core competencies focus on giving clients a voice in a unique way according to the specialized needs of the project. I love working one-on-one with small businesses, entrepreneurs,start-ups and driven individuals to help them flesh out ideas and bring their brand to a wider audience.

I have a good understanding of SEO and how to write in such a way that the piece will not only be SEO friendly and boost your conversion rates but will also engage the reader and keep them entertained.

Please feel free to contact me with your requirements.

bio:
Wordpress | SEO | SMM | Google Ads | Facebook Ads | Woocommerce | Wix | Shopify, and E-Commerce expert with years of experience in the niche. You will get 100% quality work from my end.

I am a Digital Marketing and E-Commerce marketing expert, leveraging the best tactics for your Woocommerce, Shopify, Magneto, Bigcommerce, Squarespace online shop to help you with your E-commerce business.

I surely will create & run a social media marketing campaign & make profiles on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Linked-in, Pinterest, Instagram, etc.

I will create regular posts with fresh content for your social media postings and also design banners with graphic effects that will help to attract the users on your pages.

I create custom SEO strategies based on your specific needs to help you realize your traffic & revenue goals safely. I have ranked clients in some of the most competitive niches with great success and continuously testing algorithm updates to ensure I can deliver stable long-term results. I am an expert with SEO, Web Development Services, Local SEO, PPC, Reputation Management & Social Media Marketing campaigns.

Increase your business reputation all over the internet. Remove or Push down the bad reviews completely from the searches.
